name: Shadow Chaser
effects: One single attack (4.00~7.00 scaling with current HP%) capped at 99999, heals the user for 20% of the damage dealt at Gehenna levels 1 and 2 and causes -1 Gehenna to the user, 100% hit rate
effectsNote:
The multiplier for this attack is given by the following formula, where X is the current %HP of the user:

min(exp(-1 * (X - 1) * 600 / 10000) * 300 + 400, 700) / 100

The minimum multiplier is 4.00, and never goes higher than 7.00.

name: Hundred Knights Slayer
effects: Two group attacks (2.52~3.00 each scaling with targets) capped at 99999, 100% hit rate, restores HP for 100% of the user's maximum HP, grants Last Stand to the user
effectsNote:
The multiplier per hit for this ability decreases as the number of enemies increases. The exact number is given by the following formula, where X is the number of alive enemies:

2.52+(3.00-2.52)*exp(-(X-1)*0.60)

This multiplier starts at 3.00 with only 1 enemy and is always higher than 2.52.
